name: the day to come
description:
Alto, a man in his late twenties, lives a peaceful but lonesome life... until his childhood friend and high school crush Magi comes crashing back in, now a completely different person.

A very short story about unconditional kindness, and the way self-deprecation undermines your loved one's regards for you.

Content note: Contains mentions of power abuse and dubious consent, not between the two main characters.
